title: My screen savers are not showing up for the league display
body: Yeah so like the wallpapers work just fine but when the screen savers show up its just a black screen with little lettering at the top{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: Hey guys, I'm grabbing the threads I saw this morning and forwarding them for review.  I don't have a lot of suggestions to offer right now beyond our [League Display FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207525756), but I'll try and get more info on these blank screens as soon as I can.
That didnt help it only said what was needed to use the program
im having the same problem.. we need help for this
